chapter.text: Youâ€™re still in the locker.^1500 You hear a noise behind the door.^1500 You crouch down and slightly open the door to peek outside.^1500 You cover your mouth to stop yourself from making a noise. ^4750^media You freeze.^1500 You wait until the dragging grows faint.^1500 You quietly slide out of the locker.^1500 The door swings shut with a loud slam that echoes through the halls.^1500 The sound of dragging stops.
